jobs.description: Technical leadership and development of a digitization solution for sensitive public administration procedures (Justice/Legal Sector). Coordination of the technical team, roadmap definition and translation of complex legal requirements into technical features (Business Analysis). Design of a secure document management platform, reducing paper processing and optimizing internal workflows. Implementation of strict protocols to guarantee the integrity and confidentiality of sensitive citizen data.
highlights: Project Management: Coordination of the technical team and roadmap definition
Architecture & Development: Design of a secure document management platform
Data Security: Implementation of strict protocols for integrity and confidentiality
Technical Environment: Full Stack development, Management of complex relational databases, API setup for interoperability

jobs.description: Optimization of data exchange architecture and reinforcement of system security through the development of advanced programming interfaces. Design and development of scalable RESTful and GraphQL APIs to facilitate interactions between heterogeneous services. Analysis and refactoring of database queries to reduce latency times and optimize server performance. Implementation of strict security standards for critical data flows (Authentication, Encryption).
highlights: API Architecture: Design and development of scalable RESTful and GraphQL APIs
Performance & Optimization: Analysis and refactoring of queries to reduce latency by 40%
Exchange Security: Implementation of strict security standards (Authentication, Encryption)

jobs.description: Development of intuitive digital interfaces within a demanding industrial environment, focused on user experience (UX) and accessibility. Creation of dynamic and 'Responsive' web pages, adapted for multi-device use (Desktop, Mobile, Tablet). Compliance with web development standards to ensure compatibility and navigation fluidity within the corporate network.
highlights: Front-end Development: Creation of dynamic and Responsive web pages
Technical Compliance: Compliance with standards for compatibility and fluidity
Translation of complex KPIs into actionable dashboards
Maintenance of technical compliance in a massive corporate network
